meanings.definition: Isogametes: Gametes that are similar in size and structure.
meanings.sent1: The isogametes of this organism are indistinguishable from each other.
meanings.sent2: In some species, the fusion of isogametes results in the formation of a zygote.
meanings.sent3: The isogametes decided to have a race to see who could reach the egg first.
meanings.sent4: The isogametes danced together in perfect harmony, creating new life.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the isogametes looked like tiny, identical puzzle pieces.

meanings.definition: Isogametes: Reproductive cells that are identical in form and function.
meanings.sent1: During fertilization, the isogametes combine to form a new organism.
meanings.sent2: Isogametes play a crucial role in the reproduction of certain algae species.
meanings.sent3: The isogametes threw a party to celebrate their successful union.
meanings.sent4: The isogametes worked together seamlessly, like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: In the lab, scientists observed the isogametes merging into a single, unified cell.
